mapper.insert: insert into address (addr_id,create_user_id,real_name,province,city,address,status,default_add,space1,space2,space3) values(#{addrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{defaultAdd, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{space1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{space2, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{space3, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update address set addr_id=#{addrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},create_user_id=#{createUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},real_name=#{realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},province=#{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR},city=#{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR},address=#{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},status=#{status, jdbcType=INTEGER},default_add=#{defaultAdd, jdbcType=INTEGER},space1=#{space1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},space2=#{space2, jdbcType=VARCHAR},space3=#{space3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where addr_id=#{addrId}

update address set
create_user_id=#{createUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name=#{realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province=#{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city=#{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

space1=#{space1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where addr_id=#{addrId}
